ModMetaData.name: Yayo's Combat Warcaskets
ModMetaData.author: Sokyran, Hush
ModMetaData.description:
Do you like my mods? You can support me on Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/sokyran
This mod applies several patches for (mostly) Yayo's Combat to make other mods work with it properly. Patches and features include:
- Warcaskets from Vanilla Factions Expanded - Pirates. No more are the days of paper armor caskets! - Shields from Vanilla Expanded Framework, used by many mods. They now actually do something when used! - Bulletproof power from Vanilla Factions Expanded - Ancients. It'll properly change the injury type now. - Biotic Warp from Rim-Effect: Asari and Reapers. It's going to reduce armor as intended while active. - Option to modify how strong or weak the Warcaskets are going to be to tailor your experience. - Option to make Warcaskets more or less common during raids. Also work without Yayo's Combat. - (1.4+ only) Fixes error spam from Yayo's Combat while androids from Vanilla Races Expanded - Android are clearing their memory. - (1.3 only) A couple of abilities from Rim-Effect mods that didn't apply their correct effect: Tactical Cloak, Adrenaline Rush, Combat Mastery, Biotic Pull, Biotic Stasis, Biotic Warp, Biotic Charm, and Dark Channel. Also work without Yayo's Combat.
